About CivicAlert

You don‚Äôt need a title to make a difference.
Even the smallest actions can shape a better nation.

CivicAlert is a community-driven platform that empowers citizens to report civic and environmental issues in their neighborhood. Whether it‚Äôs potholes, garbage dumps, open manholes, broken street lights, illegal parking, stray animals, mosquito breeding spots, pipeline leaks, waterlogging, noise pollution, public urination, overflowing bins, encroachments, vandalism, tree cutting, construction dust, sewer blockages, stagnant water, lack of footpaths, or overflowing drains‚Äî we believe every concern matters.

We aim to make local governance more responsive and transparent by connecting voices of the people with relevant authorities, and by building public awareness about local problems that impact daily life.

You can report an issue anonymously or with your details, upload supporting images, and track issues right on the platform. Together, we can build a cleaner, safer, and more responsive society.
